name: You are not a loan (FinnMCGEEHIN)
description:
ATTENTION:  the game is not playable in THIS browser due to the game being misconfigured, use this:You are not alone by FinnMCGEEHIN (itch.io)

I will update this page when the game jam is over, but due to the nature of game jams, I can not currently.

This game was made for the BRACKEY'S game jam 2022_2, The theme being "you are not alone" .

 The idea of the game is that you play as a sentient pile of loan paperwork, that used to belong to a wizard. The wizard gave Larry the loan life telling him that "HE WAS NOT A LOAN anymore", and that he was allowed to do whatever he wants but has to pick up all the loan paperwork lying around the dungeon and the paperwork has to be in the right order for Larry the loan to move to the next room of the dungeon.
